Uses of Class
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.activity.AeActivityValidator

Packages that use AeActivityValidator
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation This package contains classes which support BPEL validation.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.activity This package contains implementation classes for activity validation models. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.activity.scope This package contains validation model implementation classes for scope related validation. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.extensions This package contains validation model implementation classes for extensions.

Uses of AeActivityValidator in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation
 

Methods in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation that return AeActivityValidator
protected  AeActivityValidator AeBaseValidator.getParentActivityModel()
          Gets the anscestor activity model which may be our direct parent or some other activity higher up our anscestor path.
